generatedPrompts.frontCover: A charming watercolor painting of a very round, fluffy cat wearing a tiny, lopsided party hat, looking slightly bewildered as it attempts to balance a giant, precariously stacked pile of colorful wrapped gifts on its back. The cat has a comically serious expression, with wide eyes. The text "another birthday?!" is written below the cat in a beautiful, readable handwritten cursive script. The style is lighthearted and humorous, with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, and organic paint bleeds on a textured paper background. Flat 2D artwork.
generatedPrompts.backCover: A minimalist watercolor accent in the top-left corner. A small, simple, and elegant abstract splash of soft, flowing colors, including muted teal, soft coral, and a hint of pastel yellow, with visible brush strokes and organic paint bleeds on a textured paper background. The design is very sparse, leaving the majority of the back cover clean white. Flat 2D artwork.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: A subtle and decorative watercolor wash covering the top third of the panel. The wash features a gentle blend of the soft flowing colors from the front cover, such as muted teal, pastel yellow, and soft coral, fading softly down into the clean white textured paper background. A few abstract, colorful polka dots and confetti shapes are lightly scattered within the color wash. Flat 2D artwork.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: A clean, textured paper background with a simple and minimalist decorative watercolor border along the top and bottom edges only. The border is a thin, delicate wash of muted teal and soft coral, with a few tiny, scattered confetti-like paint splatters. The majority of the space is left open and clear for a handwritten message. Flat 2D artwork.
